column4: Can someone explain to my why youtube videos play flawlessy in Movie Player, but are jittery/jumpy in my browser? Flash is flash, so I would think good performance in one would be the same in another app
So when mplayer loads a youtube video, is it not using Flash or something?

Ah oh well, I'll just live with it. When I need to watch a youtube video, I'll just copy and paste the the youtube video name into mplayer search. Is there anyway to get mplayer to play Hulu vids? That would solve all my problems
you can set the preferred apps in firefox
